content:
@simulacrum I've just noticed issue #80667: "Please do not conduct triage on these runs without discussing how to do so with a release team member first".
I have a couple of questions, am trying to understand how are we @_WG-prioritization interested by this note (if we are interested at all by that).

Should we leave these issues aside and unprioritized, then assign a priority only when you folks had a chance to evaluate each of those crater runs issues?

Should we keep en eye on the "Crater runs x.yz" issues and refer to them to assign priority labels? Any other place this converstation takes place?
(pls anyone chime in with thoughts about this, I'm happy to hear any opinion)

My 2c: Each issue found by crater runs gets its own issue which should be prioritized. The crater run issues themselves are just tracking issues and thus shouldn't receive any input from wg-prioritization
Yep, that's right. Release team handles crater triage right now.
cool, thanks to both :-) :thumbs_up:
